I have been having trouble with the TR-2L Ruggedized Vehicular Wheel. Whenever I use it it just sinks into the ground a little and doesn't move. The wheels work for spinning, but it doesn't move the rover.

Anyone else having this problem?

The wheels must be facing the right way up for them to work.  The rotation is just animation.  The wheels are more like sticks that must be pointing downward.  If the stick is touching the ground, it can produce forward or backward momentum.
